creator: radha.chandrappa@wipro.com
text:
We are getting frequently below error: in catalina.out log file 

24-Jul-2011 10:18:43 org.apache.jk.core.MsgContext action
WARNING: Error sending end packet
java.net.SocketException: Broken pipe
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(Unknown Source)
        at org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket.send(ChannelSocket.java:518)
        at org.apache.jk.common.JkInputStream.endMessage(JkInputStream.java:112)
        at org.apache.jk.core.MsgContext.action(MsgContext.java:293)
        at org.apache.coyote.Response.action(Response.java:182)
        at org.apache.coyote.Response.finish(Response.java:304)
        at org.apache.jk.server.JkCoyoteHandler.invoke(JkCoyoteHandler.java:204)
        at org.apache.jk.common.HandlerRequest.invoke(HandlerRequest.java:282)
        at org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket.invoke(ChannelSocket.java:754)
        at org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket.processConnection(ChannelSocket.java:684)
        at org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket$SocketConnection.runIt(ChannelSocket.java:876)
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.threads.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run(ThreadPool.java:684)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
24-Jul-2011 10:18:43 org.apache.jk.common.ChannelSocket processConnection
WARNING: processCallbacks status 2

Over a time the application become unstable ......


Is there any fix for this issue.. please let me know.

Googles not able to get the proper information for the fix.

Thanks in advance,
Radha

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 40906 ***
